about_the_game:
Welcome to Kyoukai TCG Online, the online client for the IsoRPG-inspired TCG! Kyoukai is designed to be printed as a traditional TCG, has no mana resource, and and no AI of any kind.

You are an Entrant in a fighting tournament, run by the mysterious Carnation Society. Called through the Gate into a mysterious new world, you build a deck of 40 Cards (or Gates), and up to 15 Spirits, and battle other Entrants in various online lobbies! You can also learn more about the lore and world of Kyoukai through single player visual novels.

Unique diagonal Gates are played on a diamond 5x5 grid, and familiar mechanics lie at the heart of fast-paced TCG card battles. Each turn, each of your Units has a standard action - they can first move, then either Attack or use their Skill. You can also build your field presence by Opening Gates from your hand - but you can only Open them next to your Ready Gates already on the field. Use your on-field Units, and Normal and Fast Gates from your hand, to approach your opponent's Entrant and deal 20 damage to them!

Choose from 5 Entrants, each with their own unique card pool and deck types! Find your own unique take on your favorite Entrant, or get started with one of each Entrant's multiple pre-build starter decks.

All playable Gates will be available as soon as you download Kyoukai! There will be no unlocks or in-game currency. We currently do not plan to make future sets of Gates paid DLC - I want to add them for free, and have this as a supplement to the printed TCG. Phoenix Dawn, the first set, will release with 181 Gates!
detailed_description:
Welcome to Kyoukai TCG Online, the online client for the IsoRPG-inspired TCG! Kyoukai is designed to be printed as a traditional TCG, has no mana resource, and and no AI of any kind.

You are an Entrant in a fighting tournament, run by the mysterious Carnation Society. Called through the Gate into a mysterious new world, you build a deck of 40 Cards (or Gates), and up to 15 Spirits, and battle other Entrants in various online lobbies! You can also learn more about the lore and world of Kyoukai through single player visual novels.

Unique diagonal Gates are played on a diamond 5x5 grid, and familiar mechanics lie at the heart of fast-paced TCG card battles. Each turn, each of your Units has a standard action - they can first move, then either Attack or use their Skill. You can also build your field presence by Opening Gates from your hand - but you can only Open them next to your Ready Gates already on the field. Use your on-field Units, and Normal and Fast Gates from your hand, to approach your opponent's Entrant and deal 20 damage to them!

Choose from 5 Entrants, each with their own unique card pool and deck types! Find your own unique take on your favorite Entrant, or get started with one of each Entrant's multiple pre-build starter decks.

All playable Gates will be available as soon as you download Kyoukai! There will be no unlocks or in-game currency. We currently do not plan to make future sets of Gates paid DLC - I want to add them for free, and have this as a supplement to the printed TCG. Phoenix Dawn, the first set, will release with 181 Gates!
name: Kyoukai

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: 2.5Ghz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Support for OpenGL 3.3
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM

short_description: Online Client for the Iso-RPG TCG, Kyoukai! Become an Entrant and battle for victory on the field. No mana resource, a shared field where position matters, story-rich art, and visual novel story missions.
